constituent: cause, pent in, large, St. Bernard
koohiiStory1: We once had a dog with big paws // and oh what great trouble he´d cause // we built a huge pen // to keep him pent in // and stop him from breaking more laws //.
koohiiStory2: Why is there poop on the kitchen floor? Oh, the cause is that you kept the dog pent in the house all day. Next time remember to walk him.
myStory: nguyên nhân. bởi vì. thứ lớn ở trong miệng. nguyên nhân tại cái miệng nên có chuyện lớn.
